title: What's the longest winning/losing streak you've ever had?
body:
I'm currently on a 10 ranked loss streak right now, feels pretty unbelievable ( 5 Days break after going on 5 defeats)
Maximum 8 wins in a row.

replies.body:
1000 streak on Coop vs Ai
You can go ahead and add me if you want to.

*Looks at match history, and only sees red*

Uh... well... yeah.
Which is why I quit ranked!

> [{quoted}](name=dragon1xx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=wckkrUlT,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-09-01T14:27:37.430+0000)
>
> Which is why I quit ranked!

Why play ranked to begin with? It's just a bunch of asshats yelling at each other about how their team just isn't as good as they are. Why sign up for the abuse when you can play in an arena that is actually enjoyable. Ranked in general is stupid.

My record was 17 ranked games lost in a row.

I think, I died a bit inside then. And my Platinum border for Season 5 along with it.

My best win streak was when I was playing JG Twisted fate for 11 games.
My worst loss streak is still going on. I'm on a 17 game ranked losing streak and haven't won a game in over a week. I've dropped from B3 to B5 in a week

managed to break the streak, it was at 11 losses, i won.. but unfortunately i lost the game after that.
it seems like i get a lot more feeders in ranked than normals!
14 ranked wins in a row a few months ago

The day Xerath was released, I went on a 24 game winning streak only playing him. I was duo with a friend. I miss old Xerath... Old Xerath's ult sounded powerful. Xerath's current ult sounds like "pew pew pew."

IN ranked , i remember the second year i tried to ranked , i hit silver than with my placement 5-5 they place me bronze again , it was hell to come back silver -_- but 1 week before the season end i played with my main heimer , from bronze 2 to silver 4 if i remember right..lol like 14 wins in a row .. :O that was my best ! 
for streak loses...hmm ill say maybe around 10 -_-
14 lost, 20+ won normal+ranked games.
that would be season 4 support yorick 10-15 wins straight. dont remember the exact number
8 games atm
19 ranked losses
I had ~ a 10 win streak this season.  As far as I can recall, I haven't had any more than 5 losses in a row, but I could have just forced them from my memory...
40 ranked with veigar

Losing Streak somewhere around ~30 ranked losses in a row

Winning Streak I think 11 games

The best win streak I ever got was 11 I believe. I went nautilus jungle 8 games in a row and won. I was in just an extatic state I just couldn't stop and ended up playing 4 more games, the last one being a defeat.
24 wins i think, no further.
@doktorKaiser, Damn 22wins rofl thats epic

22 wins when I bought Hecarim in season 3, pure luck :)

18 losses when I played with my noob friend who just started playing league, after that also 16 win streak, matchmaking op -,-
8 wins, i think like 10 loses, idk about ranked
lawl, if i lose some more i might drop of a tier!
I can't even remember at this point...

9 game win streak  (2 separate occasions)
11 game loss streak (tilted off the face of the earth)

15 ranked win streak...
Not to brag or anything...
*he ha haa-ha haa*

had some ridiculous winrates in norms (if they count)
ive lost 10 games in a row, but won at least 18 in a row with aatrox.
I think my longest ranked win streak was only 7 games

15 losses.

10 wins.
8 losses something.
